function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Hysteresis in the labor market","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in people queuing in front of centrelink offices","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Job losses of 14%-25% with low-income workers twice as likely to be affected","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systematic flaws in the operation of state enforcement regimes, resulting in widespread employer non-compliance","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of concerted and coordinated global effort","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lockdown in china affecting australian economy","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Widespread loss of jobs, hours, and income","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid outflow of capital from emerging countries leading to economic instability and poverty","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Projected job losses and income reduction worldwide","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus hotspots in urban slums and refugee camps","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tourism industry collapse","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Falls in remittances by migrants","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Supply chains restructuring and nearshoring may lead to smaller headcounts and vulnerable workforces in emerging economies.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of domestic supply chain for critical medical supplies like ventilators.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"National self-sufficiency and local manufacturing as a response to global crises.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on global supply chains","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strain on global food in europe exacerbating due to pandemic response differences","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Opposition to mutual co-financing of public risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of demand in the economy due to the covid-19 crisis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of irresponsible government policies and decline of industrial sectors","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential repetition of covid-19 type events in the future","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health workers facing physical and mental health risks due to long working hours and shortage of protective equipment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate burden on women to combine paid work, unpaid domestic work, and home-schooling children.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Women in feminised sectors at risk of continued exposure to the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strict health and safety measures in health and social work sectors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural insensitivity in health response and decision-making","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Gender inequality and economic impact on women","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor nutrition and inadequate housing infrastructure violence due to housing and financial stress within indigenous communities during the pandemic.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionately high incidence rates of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lifting of onshore gas exploration moratoria","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of wind and solar from the us risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Wildlife ’reclaiming’ urban space, potentially bringing human and animal interaction that increases the risk of zoonotic diseases spreading to urban respiratory illnesses and environmental degradation.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unequal impact of the pandemic on different social groups due to differences
